description.en:
This mod pack for Farming Simulator 22 features your favorite Claas machinery but now enhanced with eXtra power, eXtreme speed and eXciting performance!
All store items in this mod feature: - Double the lifespan for durability (titanium components) - Adjusted pricing for realism (turbos ain't cheap) - Highest quality 3D models for configuration (see credits) - Realistic Power/Torque Curves, Gear Ratios and Speeds (see credits)
Arion 660X: - 300 HP / 220 KW - 832 LB-FT / 1129 NM - 46 MPH / 75 KPH - $175,000 USD
Axion 870X: - 600 HP / 440 KW - 1664 LB-FT / 2258 NM - 46 MPH / 75 KPH - $275,000 USD
Axion 960X: - 900 HP / 660 KW - 2496 LB-FT / 3387 NM - 46 MPH / 75 KPH - $375,000 USD
Axion 960TTX: - 900 HP / 660 KW - 2496 LB-FT / 3387 NM - 46 MPH / 75 KPH - $425,000 USD
Scorpion 1033X: - 200 HP / 147 KW - 631 LB-FT / 856 NM - 31 MPH / 50 KPH - $125,000 USD
Jaguar 960TTX: - 900 HP / 660 KW - 2496 LB-FT / 3387 NM - 31 MPH / 50 KPH - 25,000 Liter Capacity - Doubled Unload Speed - $475,000 USD
DirectDisc 500X: - 15 MPH / 25 KPH - $75,000 USD
Orbis 750X: - 15 MPH / 25 KPH - $150,000 USD
Orbis 950X: - 15 MPH / 25 KPH - $200,000 USD
PickUp 300X: - 15 MPH / 25 KPH - $50,000 USD
Lexion 8900X: - 900 HP / 660 KW - 2496 LB-FT / 3387 NM - 31 MPH / 50 KPH - 25,000 Liter Capacity - Doubled Unload Speed - $525,000 USD
ConvioFlex 1380X: - 15 MPH / 25 KPH - $100,000 USD
CorioFlex 1275CX: - 15 MPH / 25 KPH - $100,0000 USD
Diamant 12X: - 16 MPH / 25 KPH - $125,000 USD
Helianthus 12000X: - 16 MPH / 25 KPH - $125,000 USD
Dominator 108SLX: - 300 HP / 220 KW - 832 LB-FT / 1129 NM - 31 MPH / 50 KPH - 12,500 Liter Capacity - Doubled Unload Speed - $125,000 USD
C510X: - 15 MPH / 25 KPH - $10,000 USD
Quadrant 5300X: - 15 MPH / 25 KPH - $175,000 USD
Rollant 455X Uniwrap: - 15 MPH / 25 KPH - $100,000 USD
Cargos 9500X: - 75,000 Liter Capacity - $150,000 USD
Carat 140TDX: - 12,500 Liter Capacity Base - 25,000 Liter Capacity with Extension - $25,000 USD Base or $50,000 USD with Extension
Coming Soon: - More Harvesters, Headers and Loaders - Foraging Harvesters and Foraging Headers - Mowing and Baling Equipment
